```{r echo=FALSE, results="hide", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(fs)
library(knitr)
```

# Data description

IBD_2_subtypes: The directory to store the inflammatory Bowel Disease example data.

Phyllostachys_heterocycla: The directory to store the Phyllostachys Edulis example data. 

single_cell: The directory to store the single cell example data.

# Data link
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(fs)
x <- dir_info('./', recurse = FALSE)[, 1:3] |>
    as.data.frame() |> subset(type == "directory")

x$path <- sprintf("[%s](%s)", x$path, x$path)

knitr::kable(x, row.names = FALSE)
```
